json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="keyVaultProperties">
<prop type="array" name="locations">
<prop type="array" name="privateEndpointConnections">

command.name: create

help.short: The Event Hubs throughput units for Basic or Standard tiers, where value should be 0 to 20 throughput units. The Event Hubs premium units for Premium tier, where value should be 0 to 10 premium units.
The billing tier of this particular SKU.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.encryption.keyVaultProperties" options="key-vault-properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.geoDataReplication.locations" options="locations">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.privateEndpointConnections" options="private-endpoint-connections endpoint-connections" group="Properties">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="keyVaultProperties" arg="$parameters.properties.encryption.keyVaultProperties">
<prop type="array" name="locations" arg="$parameters.properties.geoDataReplication.locations">
<prop type="array" name="privateEndpointConnections" arg="$parameters.properties.privateEndpointConnections">

<prop type="array" name="keyVaultProperties">
<prop type="array" name="locations">
<prop type="array" name="privateEndpointConnections">

command.name: update
command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.encryption.keyVaultProperties" options="key-vault-properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.geoDataReplication.locations" options="locations">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.privateEndpointConnections" options="private-endpoint-connections endpoint-connections" group="Properties">
